About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a senior at University of Houston - Clear Lake majoring in Computer Science. My expected graduation date is May, 2020. I previously worked as a Combat Medic in the United States Army for four years. I was born in Nepal and emigrated to the US in 2009. I have been a United States Citizen since 2013.

US Army

Schofield Barracks, HI (2013-2017)

Worked as a Combat Medic / Health Care Specialist at Schofield Baarracks, Hawaii; work responsibities included: administering emergency medical treatment to battlefield casualties, assisting with outpatient and inpatient care and treatment amongst others; recepient of Army Commendation Medal, Army Good Conduct Medal.

Education

University of Houston - Clear Lake (2017-2020)

My current GPA is 3.77. The courses that I have completed include: Python Programming, Java Programming, Data Structures, Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms, Design of Database with SQL, Computer Organization and Assembly Language, System Administration with Linux Numerical Methods, Design of Digital Circuits, Differential Equations

Interests

I love reading books and have a special affinity towards non-fiction. I try as much as I can to finish at least four books a month. I also love the outdoors, exploring new places and meeting new people. In my free time, I also like to play some classic rock songs on guitar and Chopin on piano.
